name: Adventure Roo Kangaroo
description:
Kangaroo game, Adventure Roo Kangaroo - Full Version 1.3.6

Get ready for some fun and action as the star of Adventure Roo Kangaroo, Jungaroo, takes you on a journey in the Australian outback. Jump over wildlife, Jump over obstacles, Jump high, Jump low, Jump fast and slow, you take control of Jungaroo in this fantastic kangaroo jumping adventure.

Adventure Roo Kangaroo features:

- Currently 16 Challenges of pure Australian Outback fun, with each challenge increasing in difficulty.
- Realistic Animated Kangaroo Character with Colorful scenery
- Easy to make Kangaroo Jump with simple swipe control (No complex controls, very easy to control kangaroos jumping action)
- Random obstacles in certain challenges making game play more interesting.
- Environmental obstacles Kangaroos encounter in the outback such as - rock falls, fallen trees, lightning and storms.
- Animal obstacles in the outback that Kangaroos encounter in Australia such as - Snakes, Crocodiles, Koala Bears, Magpies, Kookaburras and other wild animals.
- Discover hidden secrets of the Aussie Outback such as the Australian Dropping Koala Bears ( Drop Bears )
- Help Menu - pause play in challenges to review score or view help menu.
- Gain Points by collecting stars and fruit.
- Complex Weather and environmental effects in bonus challenges
- A Unique Australian Outback game.
- Fun to play and challenging for the whole family.

The game Adventure Roo Kangaroo is a fictional simulation of the outback of Australia and care must always be taken when approaching wild Australian animals, as Jungaroo discovers in the game - Adventure Roo Kangaroo. Jungaroo’s health is time based. The longer Jungaroo stays in a danger zone the quicker Jungaroo’s health will run out so try and avoid wild animals or obstacles throughout the game.

First Release of Adventure Roo - Version 1.0.1

Current Release of Adventure Roo Kangaroo - Version 1.3.6
